articles.author: Paul Davidson and Elisabeth Buchwald, USA TODAY
articles.title: October Jobs report today: Live updates on unemployment, stock market - USA TODAY
articles.description: The October jobs report showed the economy added 261,000 jobs last month but a sharp slowdown is forecast. The unemployment rate rose to 3.7%.
articles.content:
• The unemployment rate rose from 3.5% to 3.7%, the Labor Department said Friday.
  • Economists had estimated that 190,000 jobs were added last month.
  • Employers added 261,000 jobs … [+8835 chars]
